EmailTemplate.name: First Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Periodic Activity Report {!Case.CaseNumber} - First Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
**This is an automated email message. When replying to this message, please KEEP THE SUBJECT LINE UNCHANGED and USE THE “REPLY TO ALL” button to keep your Honeywell CBM in all of your responses.**
Reminder:
Agreement Ref. No. {!Case.Reference_Number__c}
Dear Honeywell Sales Intermediary,
We would like to inform you that to date, we have not received your completed Periodic Activity Report form. Please complete the attached form and send it back to Honeywell by no later than {!Case.Due_Date__c}.
The failure to provide the duly completed Periodic Activity Report may result in suspension of the compensation payments for your services.
Should you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact your Honeywell Sponsor who is copied on this email.
Kind Regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Team
{!Case.Thread_Id}
